name: Poison Factory
description:
Made For 129th Mini Jam

How To Play

drag cards out from the selection of cards on the right side of the screen to try to mix colors to get the goal colour. The first cards will always be all the bace colours required to make the final colour.

Left click and hold to move tiles

right click to rotate tiles

Important it is very hard to get 100% (but always possible) feel free to Submit order when you cant get any Higher present.

if you do get 100% pls comment a picture because then everyone will know how cool you are

colour percentage is based on RGB values
